p: The influenza A virus was serially diluted and added to specific wells, which contained 5 × 10 3 MDCK cells/well. Infected cells were incubated at 37 °C for 48 h, after which 10 μL of Cell Counting Kit-8 (CCK-8, Dojindo, Japan) reagent [ 24] was added to each well. After incubation for 2 h, the absorbance at 450 nm was detected on a plate reader. The TCID50 was determined using the Reed–Müench method.
